CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL(CARDINAL ) and ( CARDINAL ) of ORG ( Law no . TIME “ the DATE LAW ) read :

“ ( CARDINAL ) ORG member who has paid premiums to the Fund for DATE , and for CARDINAL of DATE , shall be entitled to a disability pension if he suffers a loss of fitness for work that the senior consulting physician assesses at PERCENT or more . This disability assessment shall be based mainly on the ORG member ’s incapacity to do the job in which he was engaged and on which his membership of the ORG is based . Despite being disabled , no person shall be entitled to a disability pension while retaining full wages for the job that he used to do , or while receiving equally high wages for another job which grants pension rights , and the pension shall never be higher than the equivalent of the loss of income demonstrably incurred by the ORG member as a result of his disability .

( CARDINAL ) A disabled person who applies for a disability pension from the ORG or receives such a pension shall be obliged to provide ORG with all the information on his health and earned income that is necessary to determine his right to receive the pension . ”
